song_lyrics: Sahajānand Swāmī re, pote Parabrahma chhe re,
satyadharma sthāpī re, adharma ṭāḷiyo re,
Kīdhā vā’le nij jan ati niṣhkām re... Sahajānand° 1
Potānā āshramnī re, rīt pragaṭ karī re,
Kaḷi madhye kāmnī līdhī lāj re;
Samaju ne shāṇā re, jāṇī e pratāpne re,
Nishchay karī jāṇyā Shrī Mahārāj re... Sahajānand° 2
Jam ne pākhanḍī re, kūṭe chhe peṭane re,
Satsang felāyo re, sarve sansārmā re,
Kene gaḷe jaī nākhashn have pāsh re... Sahajānand° 3
Ekāntik dharma re, pragaṭ karī āpiyo re,
Kīdhā vā’le brahmarūp nij dās re;
Muktānand kahe chhe re, jāu ene vāraṇe re,
Jeṇe mune āpyo behad vās re... Sahajānand° 4
title: Sahajānand Swāmī re pote Parabrahma chhe re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-609: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
